statements: UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET company_name = 'Company A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET campaign_name = 'Summer Campaign', campaign_type = 'Social Media' WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET start_date='2022-05-01' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE influencer_partnerships SET campaign_type='Sponsored', end_date='2022-06-30' WHERE influencer_name='Alice' AND company_name='XYZ Corp';
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET campaign_type = 'Social Media' WHERE campaign_id = 10;
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET end_date = '2023-12-31', campaign_type = 'Social Media' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE influencer SET name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE partnership SET contract_start_date='2022-05-01' WHERE brand_name='Nike';
UPDATE influencer SET email='example@gmail.com', name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE partnership SET brand_name='New Brand', contract_start_date='2022-06-01', contract_end_date='2023-06-01' WHERE influencer_id=2;
UPDATE influencer SET followers = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE collaboration SET engagement_rate = 0.75 WHERE campaign_id = 2 AND influencer_id = 3;
UPDATE influencer SET name = 'New Name', followers = followers + 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE partnership SET payment = payment * 1.1 WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = 500 WHERE influencer_id = 123
UPDATE partnerships SET partnership_type = 'Sponsored' WHERE partnership_id = 456
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1
UPDATE collaborations SET partnership_type = 'Sponsored' WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 3
